title: swift: syncing taking too many transactions to upload a file
body:
An initial sync of a file seems to use too many transactions, namely a HEAD, PUT, HEAD

s3 does PUT, HEAD in comparison

Upload a single file from an empty directory to an empty container

```
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/ncw/.rclone.conf"
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.39-122-g6546b7e0" starting with parameters ["rclone" "sync" "-vv" "--dump" "bodies" "/tmp/new" "memstore:test-new"]
```

[snip auth phase]

List the directory

```
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/02/06 12:58:06 INFO  : Swift container test-new: Modify window is 1ns
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : HTTP REQUEST (req 0xc420120000)
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : GET /v1/account/test-new?delimiter=%2F&format=json&limit=1000 HTTP/1.1
Host: csproxy1.memset.com
User-Agent: rclone/v1.39-122-g6546b7e0
X-Auth-Token: XXXX
Accept-Encoding: gzip

2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : HTTP RESPONSE (req 0xc420120000)
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 2
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Date: Tue, 06 Feb 2018 12:58:06 GMT
X-Container-Bytes-Used: 0
X-Container-Object-Count: 0
X-Timestamp: 1517921843.42509
X-Trans-Id: tx500fa6ef2c5b4bf480946-005a79a65e

[]
```

HEAD the container to make sure it exists (strictly speaking we know this already since we have listed)

```
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/02/06 12:58:06 INFO  : Swift container test-new: Waiting for checks to finish
2018/02/06 12:58:06 INFO  : Swift container test-new: Waiting for transfers to finish
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

User-Agent: rclone/v1.39-122-g6546b7e0

X-Container-Object-Count: 0
X-Timestamp: 1517921843.42509
X-Trans-Id: tx288d77af069f427b9c548-005a79a65e
```

HEAD the file we already know isn't there?

```
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Host: csproxy1.memset.com
User-Agent: rclone/v1.39-122-g6546b7e0
X-Auth-Token: XXXX

2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

```

Upload

```
2018/02/06 12:58:06 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8

Accept-Encoding: gzip
```
